articles.title: UN Official Here
articles.content:
UN Official Here
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Catalina Devandas Aguilar, UN special rapporteur on the Rights of Persons with Disabilities, and her party arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: Director of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
articles.content:
Director of Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation Here
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Jin Xian, director of the Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Foundation, arrived here Tuesday.

articles.title: DPRK Missions Abroad Mark Day of Sun
articles.content:
DPRK Missions Abroad Mark Day of Sun
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- There took place celebrations, friendly meetings, seminars, receptions, book, photo and craftwork exhibitions and film shows on April 1-15 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun, at DPRK missions abroad.
					 The events were held at the DPRK missions in Russia, Cuba, Mongolia, Nepal, Laos, Myanmar, Bangladesh, Cambodia, Pakistan, Iran, Indonesia, India, Kuwait, Algeria, Guinea, Equatorial Guinea, Nigeria, South Africa, Senegal, DR Congo, Angola, Uganda, Egypt, Ethiopia, Germany, Czech Repbulic, Romania, Bulgaria, Switzerland, Sweden, Belarus, Poland, Britain, Austria, Italy, Spain, Venezuela, Peru, Brazil and Mexico, and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN Office and international organizations in Geneva and the DPRK permanent mission at the UN.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos showing the revolutionary careers and exploits of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and photos dealing with the revolutionary activities of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 On display there were their works, books and photos showing Korea of Songun and craftworks associated with the creative talents of the Korean people.
					
					 Such Korean films as "Kimilsungia, Flower of the Sun" and "The People Sing of Their Leader" were shown at the film shows.

articles.title: DPRK Weightlifters Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Weightlifters Back home
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The DPRK weightlifters returned home on Tuesday after competing at the 2017 Asian Weightlifting Championship.
					 They bagged five gold, seven silver and two bronze medals at the championship held in Turkmenistan from April 22 to 29.
					
					 They were greeted at the Pyongyang Railway Station by Vice-Premier Jon Kwang Ho, Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, other officials concerned, sportspersons and families.
					
					 They put garlands around the necks of the players and their coaches and presented bouquets to them.

articles.title: Mongolian Embassy Officials Visit Korean Revolution Museum
articles.content:
Mongolian Embassy Officials Visit Korean Revolution Museum
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Suren Tsoggerel and staff members of the Mongolian embassy here visited the Korean Revolution Museum on Tuesday.
					 The guests looked round historic relics and data on display at several rooms of the museum, being briefed on the fact that it has turned into the supreme museum comprehensively dealing with the revolutionary history of the peerlessly great men of Mt Paektu, a grand seat for education in the revolutionary traditions.
					
					 At the end of the visit, the ambassador made an entry in the visitor's book.

articles.title: Myohyangsan History Museum Marks Its 70th Birthday
articles.content:
Myohyangsan History Museum Marks Its 70th Birthday
Hyangsan, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Myohyangsan History Museum marked its 70th birthday.
					 The museum, visited by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il several times, is a place for education in patriotism, which houses historical relics and mementoes associated with Mt. Myohyang, a famous mountain of Korea.
					
					 For the past 70 years since its founding, the museum has served as a school for education in patriotism and turned into a world-famous cultural site, instilling patriotism into people and giving wide publicity to the history and culture of the Korean nation.
					
					 A birthday-marking ceremony took place on Tuesday.
					
					 A congratulatory message from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was conveyed to the employees of the museum at the ceremony.

articles.title: School Year for Disabled Persons Opens
articles.content:
School Year for Disabled Persons Opens
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- A ceremony took place Tuesday to start the 6th-term of School for Skilled Workers under the Central Committee of the Korean Federation for the Protection of the Disabled.
					 Present there were Kim Mun Chol, chairman of the Central Committee of the Federation, incoming students, teachers and schoolers and parents.
					
					 Speeches were made at the ceremony.
					
					 The speakers said the school has made signal achievements in the vocational education of the disabled over the past years, true to the Workers' Party of Korea's policy on protecting the disabled.
					
					 The participants went round classrooms and practice rooms of the school and watched students playing sports and amusement games.

articles.title: Chongjin Orphans' Primary and Middle Schools Inaugurated
articles.content:
Chongjin Orphans' Primary and Middle Schools Inaugurated
Chongjin, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Chongjin Orphans' Primary and Middle Schools were successfully completed.
					 The schools, built beside the baby home and orphanage, provide the best educational environment and living conditions for orphans, having buildings that house rooms dedicated to history, classrooms put on a versatile and IT basis, room for children's union and labs, dormitories, indoor stadiums and outdoor swimming pools.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place on Tuesday.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony orphans entered their schools with joy, being warmly congratulated by officials and other people.

articles.title: Architectural Festival and Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics to Be Held
articles.content:
Architectural Festival and Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics to Be Held
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The 17th May 21 Architectural Festival and the 12th Symposium on Architectural Aesthetics will be held in Pyongyang on May 9-12 with the anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Architecture" as an occasion.
					 The festival and the symposium to be held on the theme of "Juche architecture making rapid progress with the might of self-development" will involve officials and workers in the field of architectural design, construction, building materials, supervision, scientific research and educational institutions and those of relevant units.
					
					 The festival will see the presentation of building designs including the green architectural layout and city and town planning layout that won at provincial(municipal) festivals, home-made building materials, fixtures, construction gears and tools, programs for putting designing on a IT basis as well as scientific papers in the construction field.
					
					 The symposium will focus on the feats of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un ushering in the era of great prosperity of construction and on the fact that a new path for the development of Juche architecture was opened up through the construction of monumental edifices like Ryomyong Street.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Putting Water Control on Scientific Basis
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Putting Water Control on Scientific Basis
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Big efforts have been directed to putting water control on a scientific basis in the DPRK.
					 Technicians and researchers of the Taedonggang Barrage Management Bureau under the Ministry of Land and Maritime Transport and other units established a new flood control system for the Taedong River.
					
					 The new control system informs relevant headquarters of real-time data on water level behind dams built along the river and rainfall around them through local and mobile networks. And on this basis, the headquarters can forecast flood and take prompt measures by making the best option for water control.
					
					 The technicians and researchers established an integrated data transfer system ranging from headwaters of the river to its lower part.
					
					 Technicians of the Rural Economy Committee of North Phyongan Province and the Paekma-Cholsan Waterway Management Station applied a computer-aided control system to automatically opening and closing dozens of lock gates in the Paekma Lake.
					
					 Its application makes it possible to settle a water dearth in farming seasons and prevent flood damage in rainy season.

articles.title: Sogwang, Organ of KPRA
articles.content:
Sogwang, Organ of KPRA
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- It has been 80 years since President Kim Il Sung founded Sogwang, an organ of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA).
					 On this occasion, people in the DPRK recall the feats the President performed in creating the tradition of revolutionary publication during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 The President founded Sogwang as an agitprop means appropriate for the guerrilla warfare on May 3, Juche 26 (1937) in step with the anti-Japanese armed struggle developing onto a new higher stage.
					
					 Reflected in the name of Sogwang were the cherished desire of the Korean nation for the country's liberation from Japan's colonial rule and the will of revolutionaries to beat down the heinous Japanese imperialists and cast the dawn of national liberation.
					
					 Sogwang had played a big role in bringing a new peak to the development of the overall Korean revolution centered on the anti-Japanese armed struggle and preparing the KPRA members and popular masses politically and practically.
					
					 The President also made public in Sogwang his famous work "The Tasks of Korean Communists", which served as a militant banner in overthrowing the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule and accomplishing the cause of the national liberation.
					
					 After the country's liberation, the new Juche-oriented media like Rodong Sinmun, the organ of the Workers' Party of Korea, were founded on the basis of the precious traditions of revolutionary publication created by the President. And they made a victorious advance under the guidance of leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Now, the politico-ideological position of the DPRK is solid and its might grows as the days go by, as the DPRK is led by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who holds fast to the mass media as a powerful ideological weapon of the Songun revolution.

articles.title: Fifth Sports Games of Health Workers Close
articles.content:
Fifth Sports Games of Health Workers Close
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The fifth sports contest among health workers closed.
					 The contesters were divided into two groups. Coming first in total standings were the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital and the Institute of Koryo Medicine.
					
					 The closing ceremony took place at Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned and those in the public health field, and teachers and students of Pyongyang Medical College of Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 Minister of Public Health Kang Ha Guk made a closing speech.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Condemns S. Korean Conservatives' Scheme to Stay in Power
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Condemns S. Korean Conservatives' Scheme to Stay in Power
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The south Korean group of conservatives cries out for "retaking power", cheating the public under the spurious signboard of "reasonable and pure conservatism" ahead of the imminent "presidential" election.
					 The "Liberal Korea Party" and the "Parun Party" have buckled down to taking initiative, trading insults with each other though they originated from the former "Saenuri" Party. They are making last-ditch efforts, talking about "great unity of conservatives" and "single candidate from conservative parties" in a bid to prevent the opposition forces from taking power.
					
					 This is a clear proof of the desperate efforts of the remnants of the pro-Park Geun Hye cult to prolong their remaining days and stay in power though they are on the verge of ruin after being sternly punished by history.
					
					 Conservatism in south Korea just serves as a "lever for preserving interests" only as it has neither philosophy nor political view, not being the one as thought and ideology.
					
					 One can easily judge what the conservative group, a group of disgusting philistines and human scum, would do if they stay in power from the fact that the preceding puppet conservative regimes of south Korea were all enemies of reunification and the nation.
					
					 The conservative regimes regarded it as a "state policy" to remain desperately opposed to communism, the north and reunification. Such a policy served as the "most valuable one" of pro-U.S. conservatism.
					
					 When the national division and the inter-Korean confrontation festered, the U.S. and the pro-U.S. conservative group of south Korea worked hard to take advantage of it.
					
					 The conservative regimes mercilessly cracked down on the progressive democratic forces and pro-reunification patriotic forces by branding them as "pro-north leftist forces," crying out for achieving "unification by overthrowing or prevailing over communism" and "unification of social systems."
					
					 The Syngman-Rhee regime set it as a "principal state line" to persist in anti-communism. The Park Chung-Hee military fascist regime ruthlessly nipped in its bud the spirit of democratization growing among the south Korean public with the April 19 popular uprising as a momentum and quenched the public desire for reunification mounting with the July 4 joint statement as an occasion by pursuing the "yusin" fascist dictatorship. The brutal Chun Doo Hwan and Roh Tae Woo regimes cruelly suppressed the righteous public campaign for independence, democracy and reunification, turning Kwangju City into a sea of blood.
					
					 The Kim Yong Sam regime pushed the north-south relations to a complete catastrophe by rubbing salt into the wounds of the compatriots in the north who lost their great leader. The Lee Myung Bak and Park Geun Hye regimes caused havoc in the June 15 era of reunification by chilling the atmosphere for national unity and independent reunification.
					
					 As seen above, the conservative regimes in south Korea were all keen on doing evils only.
					
					 Shortly ago, Hong Jun Phyo, "presidential candidate" from the "Liberal Korea Party" openly cried out for "introducing tactical nuclear weapons", welcoming THAAD deployment. What he uttered are just reckless outbursts of a thrice-cursed traitor seized with the conservative ill habit of escalating confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					
					 It is quite natural that if such conservative elements stay in power, the north-south relations already plunged into a catastrophe will come to total collapse and the Korean territory will turn into a theater of nuclear war of outsiders.
					
					 Now south Korean people are criticizing the behavior of the conservatives keen on committing frauds under the pretext of "security" as a "risky gambling on the lives of 50 million south Koreans" and "war game of political philistines for taking power."
					
					 The conservative group is just dregs of the times and reactionary one of history as it goes against the trend of times.
					
					 To eliminate the hateful conservative remnants to the last one is the only way out for the south Korean people.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Hits out at Park Geun Hye's Trick to Prolong Her Remaining Days
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Hits out at Park Geun Hye's Trick to Prolong Her Remaining Days
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye of south Korea thrown into the Seoul Detention House is playing a trick to prolong her dirty remaining days.
					 She sold off her house in Samsong-dong of Seoul and bought a new house. And ahead of her first trial she asked for more time and delayed trial by putting forth her yes-man lawyer.
					
					 The traitor, who deserves death by dismemberment for the lots of crimes that have already been revealed including bribery and abuse of power, is still going impudent.
					
					 Upon her return home after being ousted from Chongwadae, she let out poisonous rhetoric that "it will take time but the truth is bound to be revealed".
					
					 During prosecution investigation she reeled off poor excuses that "it is part of normal 'state' administration" and that "she has never received bribes" and went the lengths of saying that "she does not remember" as for the crime of wresting a big bundle of banknotes from businesses in conspiracy with Choe Sun Sil.
					
					 This is a mockery of the south Koreans as it is a cunning trick to save her trial from having adverse impact on the conservative forces keen on coming to power again.
					
					 As revealed by criminal facts on daily disclosure including the huge fund concealed at her house in Samsong-dong, the more trick she resorts, the bigger indignation of the public it will touch off and the heavier punishment she will meet.
					
					 However, the traitor is going on the rampage because she pins her hope in the conservative forces' re-assumption of power at the "presidential" election.
					
					 The group of conservatives is desperately trying to rally the conservatives that had gone asunder and put pressure on the puppet Court of Justice and at the same time turn the table of the election in its favor over the "security" issue and thus realize its ambition to re-seize power.
					
					 The conservatives, including "presidential" candidate from the "Liberal Korea Party" Hong Jun Phyo who defends Park Geun Hye while calling her impeachment unjust, are crying out for pardoning the traitor. The traitor, to earn indictment and top punishment, is granted privileged treatment even in the prison under the auspices of the conservative group.
					
					 Traitor Park is staging a deceptive farce to create an environment favorable for the conservative group's coming to power again but such a sleight of hand can never work.
					
					 It is the warning of history and the unanimous desire of all the fellow countrymen that not only Park Geun Hye, chief culprit of evil acts against the nation, people and humanity, but the remnants of the conservative group made up of hideous accomplices have to be abolished and thrown overboard.
					
					 The top class criminal and accomplices have to receive due punishment.
					
					 Trial by history and people's mindset has not yet ended.

articles.title: DPRK Has No Reason to Be Afraid of War with U.S.: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Has No Reason to Be Afraid of War with U.S.: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Trump administration that newly took office in the U.S. is provoking the DPRK with no reason, not knowing what rival it stands against.
					 The riff-raffs taken aback by the U.S. bellicose hysteria is busy currying favor with the Trump administration and even have gone so disgusting as to defend its criminal hostile policy and nuclear threat and blackmail toward the DPRK.
					
					 Minju Joson Tuesday in a commentary says this arouses our ridicules. 
					
					 We feel with each passing moment the need to certainly make the U.S., going helter-skelter like a villain ignorant of the DPRK, come to its senses, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 There is no reason for the DPRK to be afraid of military conflicts and any form of wars with the U.S.
					
					 It is the unanimous will and fixed faith of the army and people of the DPRK to turn a military attack to be mounted by the U.S. into a grand war of justice for national reunification and wipe out the aggressors and the strongholds of evils and thus brilliantly realize the historic cause of Korea's reunification.
					
					 Moreover, we have in stock powerful military means for honorably concluding the DPRK-U.S. stand-off that has lasted for decades.
					
					 The U.S. will be seriously mistaken if it thinks the DPRK will be browbeaten by the military provocation by aggressors or opt for compromising with them.
					
					 Any military provocation against the DPRK will precisely mean a total war which will lead to the final doom of the U.S. This is a stark reality today.
					
					 The Trump administration would be well advised to learn how humbly the preceding administrations were put in the awkward position of lowering the fist of pressure they had raised before the DPRK.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists Wage Another Reckless Military Drill
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists Wage Another Reckless Military Drill
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The gangster-like U.S. imperialists have gone extremely reckless in their moves to unleash a nuclear war on the Korean peninsula.
					 On May 1, the U.S. imperialists committed one more military provocation of conducting a nuclear bomb dropping drill against the major objects of the DPRK in the sky over south Korea by bringing a formation of notorious nuclear strategic bomb B-1B in the wake of Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 17 joint military drills.
					
					 The bombers took off Guam and stealthily came in the sky over the East Sea of Korea in order to acquire the procedure and way of the coordinated operation with the strategic striking means such as nuclear carrier and nuclear sub.
					
					 What merits a serious attention is that such military game is underway when Trump and other U.S. warmongers are crying out for making a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK day after day.
					
					 The reckless military provocation is pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula closer to the brink of nuclear war.
					
					 The army of the DPRK is keenly watching the military movement of the U.S. imperialists, fully ready to react to all forms of war they will opt for with a powerful nuclear treasured sword for self-defence.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist warmongers would be well advised to always remember the solemn warning of the Korean People's Army.

articles.title: Japan's Aim in Spreading Story about Crisis on Korean Peninsula Disclosed
articles.content:
Japan's Aim in Spreading Story about Crisis on Korean Peninsula Disclosed
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Japan chief executive took the lead in spreading the story about the crisis on the Korean peninsula soon after the report about the U.S. preemptive attack on Syria was made as if had being waited for it to happen.
					 Japan ministers are following his lead in getting vocal about the story.
					
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Tuesday says the aim sought by Japan in spreading the story is to step up the constitutional modification which it has so far attempted with the possible crisis on the peninsula as a pretext, and to put spurs to the "Self-Defense Forces" overseas dispatch.
					
					 Another aim is to stimulate its reeling economy with the orders of new war supplies from the U.S. after a war breaks out on the Korean peninsula and thus gain a windfall just as it did during the past Korean war, the news analyst says, and goes on:
					
					 If a war breaks out on the peninsula, those keen on doing harm to the DPRK, to say nothing of those who backed them, can not go scot-free.
					
					 In case of a nuclear war on the peninsula, Japan that houses logistic bases, launching bases and sortie bases of the U.S. forces will be put under radioactive clouds before any country.
					
					 If Japan is truly concerned about its interests, it has to make due efforts for the peaceful settlement of the Korean peninsula issue.
					
					 As the first country in the world that suffered A-bomb disaster, Japan knows better than others how terrible the nuclear disaster is.
					
					 The Japanese authorities should behave with discretion, clearly understanding that it is Japan which will be affected most once a war breaks out on the peninsula.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Russia
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The Khabarovsk Territory Publishing House of Russia brought out in pamphlet respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" on April 14 to mark the Day of the Sun.
					 The work published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012) clarifies the revolutionary exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il during their lifetime.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for firmly preserving and glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Introduced by British Organization
Pyongyang, May 2 (KCNA) -- The British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea carried President Kim Il Sung's work "Enhancing the Role of the Popular Masses Is the Guarantee for Victory in the Cause of Independence" in its special bulletin "Star of Independence" on April 4 to mark the Day of the Sun.
					 The work, made public on April 15, Juche 81 (1992), says that the President's life of 80 years was the one of struggle in which he devoted himself to the people as their son, and clarifies that the Workers' Party of Korea has firmly maintained the Juche-oriented stand and principle, always guided by the Juche idea, in the whole course of the revolution and construction. It also clarified that the common task facing the Koreans and the world people is to build an independent new world.
					
					 The bulletin carried a photo of the President.

articles.title: Llegan a Pyongyang la funcionaria de Consejo de DDHH de la ONU y su comitiva
articles.content:
Llegan a Pyongyang la funcionaria de Consejo de DDHH de la ONU y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- Catalina Devandas Aguilar, informante especial encargado de los derechos de los discapacitados, perteneciente al Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU, y su comitiva llegaron hoy a esta capital.

articles.title: Director de Consejo de Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il llega a Pyongyang
articles.content:
Director de Consejo de Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il llega a Pyongyang
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- Llego este martes a esta capital Jin Xian, director del Consejo de la Fundacion Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Museo de la Historia del monte Myohyang acoge 70o aniversario de su fundacion
articles.content:
Museo de la Historia del monte Myohyang acoge 70o aniversario de su fundacion
Hyangsan, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- El Museo de la Historia del monte Myohyang es la base de la educacion en el patriotismo en que esta impregnada la historia de direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y el lugar con vestigios culturales nacionales que se conservan originalmente los sitios pintorescos de interes historicos y las reliquias del famoso monte Myohyang.
					Durante su visita realizada el dia 3 de mayo del 36 (1947) de la Era Juche, el Presidente instruyo la necesidad de construir el museo y conservarlo y al visitarlo en mas de 10 ocasiones dedico los esfuerzos metales y fisicos para que el museo se acondicione como el tesoro nacional a ser transmitido de generacion en generacion.
					
					Orientando el museo en varias ocasiones, el Dirigente hizo conservar y proteger bien las reliquias culturales tomando como lo principal la propaganda de los vestigios historicos.
					
					Durante los 70 anos despues de su fundacion, el museo se ha acondicionado como la base de la educacion en patriotismo y el lugar con vestigios culturales de talla mundial, sembro el patriotismo en el pueblo y propagaron ampliamente la historia y cultura de la nacion.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 2 el acto conmemorativo.
					
					En la ocasion se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea enviado a los empleados del museo.

articles.title: Iniciado 6o curso escolar de escuela profesional de discapacitados
articles.content:
Iniciado 6o curso escolar de escuela profesional de discapacitados
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar hoy el acto de inicio del 6o curso escolar de la escuela profesional del Comite Central de la Federacion de Proteccion a Discapacitados de Corea. 
					Tomaron parte en la ocasion Kim Mun Chol, presidente del Comite Central de la FPDC, los nuevos matriculados, los profesores, los alumnos y los padres. 
					
					Hubo intervenciones en la ceremonia.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que en acato a la politica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en materia de la proteccion a los discapacitados, el plantel docente ha logrado muchos resultados durante el pasado en la educacion profesional de los discapacitados.
					
					A continuacion, los participantes recorrieron las salas de lecciones y de ensayo de la escuela y vieron los juegos deportivos y recreativos de los matriculados.

articles.title: EE.UU. incrementa mas el peligro de guerra nuclear
articles.content:
EE.UU. incrementa mas el peligro de guerra nuclear
Pyongyang, 2 de mayo (ACNC) -- Propasan las imprudencias militares de los imperialistas yanquis para provocar la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					El primero de mayo, inmediatamente despues del termino de los ejercicios conjuntos militares Key Resolve y Foal Eagle-17, los imperialistas norteamericanos volvieron a perpetrar la imperdonable provocacion militar de realizar el entrenamiento de lanzamiento de bombas nucleares introduciendo la escuadrilla B-1B en el espacio aereo surcoreano.
					
					Este dia, la escuadrilla de bombarderos B-1B, despegados en la isla Guam, aparecieron sigilosamente en el espacio aereo del Mar Este de Corea, donde adiestraron los procesos y los metodos de operacion conjunta con el portaaviones, el submarino nuclear y otros medios de ataque estrategicos, emplazados en la misma zona maritima, y realizaron el lanzamiento de bombas nucleares en el espacio aereo de la region surcoreana contra los objetos importantes de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Lo que no podemos pasar por alto es que tales locuras provocativas militares de EE.UU. se coinciden en el tiempo con los disparates de Trump y otros belicistas norteamericanos quienes hablan del "ataque preventivo" contra la RPDC.
					
					Las cada vez mas abiertas tentativas militares de EE.UU. llevan mas al borde de guerra nuclear la delicada situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Ahora, el Ejercito Popular de Corea, dispuesto de las armas nucleares, mantiene aguda vigilancia sobre los movimientos militares de los enemigos esta completamente listo para responder a la guerra de toda forma optada por el imperio.
					
					Los belicistas norteamericanos no deben olvidar ni un momento la advertencia del EPC y actuar con prudencia.
